page.title: 07BLACKWELL GOLF CLUB 2
page.content: The course is open every day of the year and golf can be from 9am until dusk. Non-members can play on any week-day for the cost of Â£11 for adults and Â£4 for juniors. to become a member application is made in writing to rhe Secretary. Experience of playing and recommendation by another member are taken into consideration. The membership fee was not disclosed. There are two committees, one for men and one for women. Women have separate days allocated to them for playing. The club uses a wide range of maintenance equipment, including two tractors, grasscutters and mowers, and equipment for spraying, fertilizing, aeration and hole cutting. Bobby Jones, Walter Hagan, Sandy Lyle and Thomson have played there,as well as Jimmy Tarbuck and Gerry Marsden.
